info.name: Better ChatGPT+
info.description:
ℹ️ A CSS modification for Open AI ChatGPT FREE & PLUS version with visual improvements

✅ Perfectly tested on Chromium based browsers (Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, etc) and Mozilla Firefox

❓ NOTE: It may not work perfectly with ChatGPT extensions due to incompatible CSS customizations (scroll down to see the list of compatible extensions)

🛠️ Compatible Extensions (Chromium & Firefox)
- GammarlyGo
- Superpower ChatGPT
- WebChatGPT: ChatGPT with internet access
- GPT Macros
- AIPRM for ChatGPT 

If you find a bug, want to help me or want to suggest something, feel free to contact me via Telegram
I made this as a hobby. I'll fix it when I have free time. Please be patient. Don't forget to leave me a review below. Hope you like it :)

- Okki Dwi -
info.additionalInfo:
✨ Features

- Add fake ChatGPT PLUS logo
- Hide the "Examples, Capabilities, and Limitations" Column (FREE version)
- Fixed GrammarlyGo text area
- Add wider text input and output blocks
- Hide "Upgrade to PLUS" menu (FREE version) / "My Plans" menu (PLUS version)
- Remove "Free Research Preview" text from footer
- Sidebar light mode redesign
- Sidebar dark mode redesign
- Dark mode "New Chat" redesign
- NEW: Add compatibility layout support to "Superpower ChatGPT" and "WebChatGPT: ChatGPT with internet access" extensions (Chromium & Firefox)
- Other improvements

📜 Changelogs

v2.5 Add compatibility layout support to "GPT Macros" and "AIPRM for ChatGPT" extensions (Chromium & Firefox), change sidebar light mode and chat background color & bug fixes | 23/04/2023

v2.0 Add compatibility layout support to "Superpower ChatGPT" and "WebChatGPT: ChatGPT with internet access" extensions (Chromium & Firefox), change fake ChatGPT PLUS logo position & bug fixes | 21/04/2023

v1.5 Fixed light mode and dark mode sidebar bugs (due to the new layout of OpenAI ChatGPT) | 21/04/2023

v1.0 Initial release | 20/04/2023
